talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Windbag Sobong${action:Talk}
What beautiful day for playing my pipe!
My name's Windbag Sobong.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>[Talk] Who are the power brokers of Red Lotus Palace?</html>
<html>[Talk] Why is everyone always cooking flower pancakes?</html>
<html>[Talk] Why does it seem so chaotic around here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Windbag Sobong$
I love a good rumor. I need gossip like you need water.
Some day I'll write a book about what happens behind the scenes in Red Lotus Palace.

$Windbag Sobong$
Not averse to self-deprecation, I gave myself the name Windbag.
In a way, you could say I catch rumors in the wind and blow them back at whoever nudges me a bit.
Sobong actually means 'tree swaying in the wind'.
I'll bend my ear to any rumor I hear in the wind.

$Windbag Sobong${action:Sad}
Come hang out with me anytime.
I get really bored if I don't hear at least some juicy gossip each day.
A windbag like me needs to catch some quality rumors on the wind to be fulfilled, don't you think?

$Windbag Sobong$
Lately whenever I hear a whisper in the wind and turn around
you're standing there, {user_nick}.
Neat, huh?

$Windbag Sobong${sound:npc_Hongryun_Talker_sp_04.ogg}
The memorial service is about to begin.
This is when most people take a moment to hold a ritual offering for the dead.
The basic idea is to provide comfort for the vengeful spirits in your family line.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there any special reason for it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Windbag Sobong$
No ceremonial offering table is complete without flower pancakes.
Any kind of flower will do as long as it's edible, but…
flower pancakes made of Blood Flowers are typically considered
the best type for offering rituals in our kingdom.

$Windbag Sobong${sound:npc_Hongryun_Talker_sp_06.ogg}
If I had to choose the most influential group in Red Lotus Palace, I'd definitely go with the Blue Clan.
They were originally a small clan located on the southern frontier,
but they gradually claimed more and more influence as they piled up wins in the Combat Tournament.
Still...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>First heir? Does that mean there is a second successor?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Windbag Sobong$
To a man, they referred to the era of the previous leader's reign, which ended 1 year ago,
as the Blue Clan's golden age.
But after he was slain by his first heir, who had become a vengeful spirit,
it would seem their influence has been on the wane.

$Windbag Sobong$
You didn't know? The previous leader had two sons.
The first one, who became a vengeful spirit, broke the laws of filial piety and killed his father. His name is Ultima.
The second one is the current leader of Blue Clan, Mukheun.

$Windbag Sobong$
Legend has it that the Blood Flower has the power to exorcise vengeful spirits.
The problem is this flower is extremely rare.
Deep within the Red Lotus Palace Garden is a place
where palace attendants are said to cultivate these Blood Flowers.

$Windbag Sobong${sound:npc_Hongryun_Talker_sp_07.ogg}
The public became greatly concerned for their safety after the Exile of the Vanquished invasion.
The underlings of Commander Jade are up to something.
Why the heck would they be interested in that vast plain of nothingness?

$Windbag Sobong${sound:npc_Hongryun_Talker_sp_05.ogg}
The head merchant of the night market will know more about that.
Apparently they're gathering soldiers for some kind of expeditionary force.

$Windbag Sobong$
It's actually pretty strange...
Nobody would bat an eyelash no matter how many exiled criminals died there.
Why is there suddenly so much interest in that place?

$Windbag Sobong$
Oh dear... It looks like you've already been to the Haunted Village? It's not safe to visit the Haunted Village often during the Festival of Conjuring. It's wise to come back tomorrow.
